about_the_game:
Harness the power of the storm and wrap your weapons in skins so cool they’ll turn your enemies’ blood to ice. Containing two weapon skins usable across all in-game guns, unleash your inner cold-blooded killer with the Hail & Ice DLC pack.

Features:
  • Glacial Glare (weapon skin)
  • Digital Blizzard (weapon skin)
  • Snowstorm (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
